charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1101_0100_2:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a
sound so deafeningly explosive, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] thought a
volcano had erupted!
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1101_0200_2:
Following the sound, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found Eri and Annihilape
training fiercely.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_0400_1: Want to join us for training?
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_0500_1:
There are so many strong and kind sync pairs
on Pasio. We’ve gotta get stronger so we don’t
fall behind!
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_0301_0600_1: Can you even get any stronger?
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_0302_0800_1:
How far are you planning to
push yourself?
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_1000_1:
I want us to encourage each other and grow
stronger together!
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_1100_1:
If we keep growing stronger, we’ll be able to do
things we never could before.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_1200_1:
For me, that means learning more
wrestling moves—
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_1400_1: Annihilape’s energy is fueled by his anger.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_1500_1:
People say that when an Annihilape’s anger rises
beyond a critical point...
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_1600_1:
it gains power that’s unfettered by the limits of its
physical body.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_1700_1: When someone I care about gets hurt...
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_1800_1: I guess my anger rises beyond a critical point, too.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_1900_1: Intense anger can be tremendously powerful.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2000_1:
But anger can also be dangerous if you let it
control you.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2100_1:
That was the case when we of Team Star carried
out Operation Star to get revenge on our bullies.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2200_1:
The operation was a success, but it came at a
heavy cost.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2300_1:
Both Team Star and the bullies lost their place in
the academy...
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2400_1:
That’s why I think acting out of anger
is dangerous.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2500_1:
But that doesn’t mean we have to bottle up
our feelings.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2600_1:
Sometimes, feeling sad or angry for someone can
make you stronger and help you protect others!
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2700_1: The key is in how you control your emotions.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2800_1:
That’s why Annihilape and I are training not only
our bodies but also our minds and emotions!
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_2900_1:
Keeping a cool head, hiding our fiery hearts,
and attacking when the opponent lets down
their guard...
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_3000_1: It’d be cool if we could battle like that.
charaepi_ch0330_00_biwa/2301_1201_3100_1:
That kind of mindset would make a powerful
weapon!
